MajorClaims.MC2: studying abroad does not only have advantages, but also can change us in a very positive way

Claims.C1: Students gain a lot out of the experience personally, academically, and culturally
Claims.C2: students who study outside their countries can get a lot of experience living in a foreign country
Claims.C3: the new academic experience that the students can obtain at the institution where they are pursuing their studies
Claims.C4: Most important is the cultural aspect of the experience

Premises.P1: Living in a new country requires a great amount of flexibility and adaptability in one's character
Premises.P2: students might face many challenges in the host country
Premises.P3: they should be able to deal with the obstacles that they may encounter
Premises.P4: Overcoming problems teaches the students how to be more mature and self-independence
Premises.P5: they will get exposed to a different educational system
Premises.P6: They will meet new professors and new classmates which makes the academic experience different from that in their home country
Premises.P7: While living in a foreign country, students can learn a lot about the culture of that country
Premises.P8: they can meet different people of the country
Premises.P9: They can learn about their way of thinking, their customs and traditions, and way of life
Premises.P10: Learning about others' cultures is so important
Premises.P11: It contributes in building a new understanding in us of how we see the world
Premises.P12: It makes us more open, and willing to accept different ideas and thoughts
Premises.P13: it educates us about the world we are living in
